content:
Please select the new Neighbor
who needs my relocation service...

Hoho~!
I'll go ahead and submit
a formal relocation request for {邀请的新友邻名字}.
Here's a <color=#8AAB4B>Building Plot Fence</color> for our new Neighbor's move-in. I'll leave it to you.

Hoho hoho~No problem!
I've added all the new Neighbors invited by <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>
to the New Neighbor Registration Form.

...Ah, one moment please.
Looks like <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>'s backpack is full.
Please clear some space and come see me again!

Hoho, no problem, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>
Take your time to think about it.
Getting along with neighbors is quite an art in life, you know.
